trans-unit.source: Welcome to Microsoft Azure StorSimple device deployment.
trans-unit.target: Welcome to Microsoft Azure StorSimple device deployment.

trans-unit.source: These deployment tutorials apply to StorSimple 8000 Series Update 1.0.
trans-unit.target: These deployment tutorials apply to StorSimple 8000 Series Update 1.0.

trans-unit.source: This series of tutorials describes how to configure your StorSimple device, and includes a configuration checklist, configuration prerequisites, and detailed configuration steps.
trans-unit.target: This series of tutorials describes how to configure your StorSimple device, and includes a configuration checklist, configuration prerequisites, and detailed configuration steps.

trans-unit.source: Deployment prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Deployment prerequisites

trans-unit.source: The following sections explain the configuration prerequisites for your StorSimple Manager service and your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: The following sections explain the configuration prerequisites for your StorSimple Manager service and your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: For the StorSimple Manager service
trans-unit.target: For the StorSimple Manager service

trans-unit.source: Before you begin, make sure that:
trans-unit.target: Before you begin, make sure that:

trans-unit.source: You have your Microsoft account with access credentials.
trans-unit.target: You have your Microsoft account with access credentials.

trans-unit.source: You have your Microsoft Azure storage account with access credentials.
trans-unit.target: You have your Microsoft Azure storage account with access credentials.

trans-unit.source: Your Microsoft Azure subscription is enabled for the StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: Your Microsoft Azure subscription is enabled for the StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: Your subscription should be purchased through the [Enterprise Agreement](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/enterprise-agreement/).
trans-unit.target: Your subscription should be purchased through the [Enterprise Agreement](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/enterprise-agreement/).

trans-unit.source: You have access to terminal emulation software such as PuTTY.
trans-unit.target: You have access to terminal emulation software such as PuTTY.

trans-unit.source: For the device in the datacenter
trans-unit.target: For the device in the datacenter

trans-unit.source: Before configuring the device, make sure that:
trans-unit.target: Before configuring the device, make sure that:

trans-unit.source: Your device is fully unpacked, mounted on a rack and fully cabled for power, network, and serial access as described in:
trans-unit.target: Your device is fully unpacked, mounted on a rack and fully cabled for power, network, and serial access as described in:

trans-unit.source: Unpack, rack mount, and cable your 8600 device
trans-unit.target: Unpack, rack mount, and cable your 8600 device

trans-unit.target: For the network in the datacenter

trans-unit.source: Before you begin, make sure that:
trans-unit.target: Before you begin, make sure that:

trans-unit.source: The ports in your datacenter firewall are opened to allow for iSCSI and cloud traffic as described in [Networking requirements for your StorSimple device](storsimple-system-requirements.md#networking-requirements-for-your-storsimple-device).
trans-unit.target: The ports in your datacenter firewall are opened to allow for iSCSI and cloud traffic as described in [Networking requirements for your StorSimple device](storsimple-system-requirements.md#networking-requirements-for-your-storsimple-device).

trans-unit.source: Step-by-step deployment
trans-unit.target: Step-by-step deployment

trans-unit.source: Use the following step-by-step instructions to deploy your StorSimple device in the datacenter.
trans-unit.target: Use the following step-by-step instructions to deploy your StorSimple device in the datacenter.

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Create a new service
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Create a new service

trans-unit.source: A StorSimple Manager service can manage multiple StorSimple devices.
trans-unit.target: A StorSimple Manager service can manage multiple StorSimple devices.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps to create a new instance of the StorSimple Manager service.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps to create a new instance of the StorSimple Manager service.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] If you did not enable the automatic creation of a storage account with your service, you will need to create at least one storage account after you have successfully created a service.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] If you did not enable the automatic creation of a storage account with your service, you will need to create at least one storage account after you have successfully created a service.

trans-unit.source: This storage account will be used when you create a volume container.
trans-unit.target: This storage account will be used when you create a volume container.

trans-unit.source: If you did not create a storage account automatically, go to [Configure a new storage account for the service](#configure-a-new-storage-account-for-the-service) for detailed instructions.
trans-unit.target: If you did not create a storage account automatically, go to [Configure a new storage account for the service](#configure-a-new-storage-account-for-the-service) for detailed instructions.

trans-unit.source: If you enabled the automatic creation of a storage account, go to [Step 2: Get the service registration key](#step-2-get-the-service-registration-key).
trans-unit.target: If you enabled the automatic creation of a storage account, go to [Step 2: Get the service registration key](#step-2-get-the-service-registration-key).

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Get the service registration key
trans-unit.target: Step 2: Get the service registration key

trans-unit.source: After the StorSimple Manager service is up and running, you will need to get the service registration key.
trans-unit.target: After the StorSimple Manager service is up and running, you will need to get the service registration key.

trans-unit.source: This key is used to register and connect your StorSimple device with the service.
trans-unit.target: This key is used to register and connect your StorSimple device with the service.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps in the Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps in the Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Configure and register the device through Windows PowerShell for StorSimple
trans-unit.target: Step 3: Configure and register the device through Windows PowerShell for StorSimple

trans-unit.source: Use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to complete the initial setup of your StorSimple device as explained in the following procedure.
trans-unit.target: Use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to complete the initial setup of your StorSimple device as explained in the following procedure.

trans-unit.source: You will need to use terminal emulation software to complete this step.
trans-unit.target: You will need to use terminal emulation software to complete this step.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Use PuTTY to connect to the device serial console](#use-putty-to-connect-to-the-device-serial-console).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Use PuTTY to connect to the device serial console](#use-putty-to-connect-to-the-device-serial-console).

trans-unit.source: Step 4: Complete minimum device setup
trans-unit.target: Step 4: Complete minimum device setup

trans-unit.source: For the minimum device configuration of your StorSimple device, you are required to:
trans-unit.target: For the minimum device configuration of your StorSimple device, you are required to:

trans-unit.source: Set up the secondary DNS server.
trans-unit.target: Set up the secondary DNS server.

trans-unit.source: Enable iSCSI on at least one network interface.
trans-unit.target: Enable iSCSI on at least one network interface.

trans-unit.source: Assign fixed IP addresses to both the controllers.
trans-unit.target: Assign fixed IP addresses to both the controllers.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps in the Management Portal to complete the minimum device setup.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps in the Management Portal to complete the minimum device setup.

trans-unit.source: Step 5: Create a volume container
trans-unit.target: Step 5: Create a volume container

trans-unit.source: A volume container has storage account, bandwidth, and encryption settings for all the volumes contained in it.
trans-unit.target: A volume container has storage account, bandwidth, and encryption settings for all the volumes contained in it.

trans-unit.source: You will need to create a volume container before you can start provisioning volumes on your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: You will need to create a volume container before you can start provisioning volumes on your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps in the Management Portal to create a volume container.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps in the Management Portal to create a volume container.

trans-unit.source: Step 6: Create a volume
trans-unit.target: Step 6: Create a volume

trans-unit.source: After you create a volume container, you can provision a storage volume on the StorSimple device for your servers.
trans-unit.target: After you create a volume container, you can provision a storage volume on the StorSimple device for your servers.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps in the Management Portal to create a volume.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps in the Management Portal to create a volume.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] StorSimple Manager can create only thinly provisioned volumes.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] StorSimple Manager can create only thinly provisioned volumes.

trans-unit.source: You cannot create fully provisioned or partially provisioned volumes.
trans-unit.target: You cannot create fully provisioned or partially provisioned volumes.

trans-unit.source: Step 7: Mount, initialize, and format a volume
trans-unit.target: Step 7: Mount, initialize, and format a volume

trans-unit.source: The following steps are performed on your Windows Server host.
trans-unit.target: The following steps are performed on your Windows Server host.

trans-unit.source: For the high availability of your StorSimple solution, we recommend that you configure MPIO on your host servers (optional) prior to configuring iSCSI.
trans-unit.target: For the high availability of your StorSimple solution, we recommend that you configure MPIO on your host servers (optional) prior to configuring iSCSI.

trans-unit.source: MPIO configuration on host servers will ensure that the servers can tolerate a link, network, or interface failure.
trans-unit.target: MPIO configuration on host servers will ensure that the servers can tolerate a link, network, or interface failure.

trans-unit.source: For MPIO and iSCSI installation and configuration instructions on Windows Server host, go to [Configure MPIO for your StorSimple device](storsimple-configure-mpio-windows-server.md).
trans-unit.target: For MPIO and iSCSI installation and configuration instructions on Windows Server host, go to [Configure MPIO for your StorSimple device](storsimple-configure-mpio-windows-server.md).

trans-unit.source: These will also include the steps to mount, initialize and format StorSimple volumes.
trans-unit.target: These will also include the steps to mount, initialize and format StorSimple volumes.

trans-unit.source: For MPIO and iSCSI installation and configuration instructions on a Linux host, go to [Configure MPIO for your StorSimple Linux host](storsimple-configure-mpio-linux.md)

trans-unit.source: Updating your device can take several hours.

trans-unit.source: To update your device
trans-unit.target: To update your device

trans-unit.source: On the device **Quick Start** page, click **Devices**.
trans-unit.target: On the device **Quick Start** page, click **Devices**.

trans-unit.source: Select the physical device, click **Maintenance** and then click **Scan Updates**.
trans-unit.target: Select the physical device, click **Maintenance** and then click **Scan Updates**.

trans-unit.source: A job to scan for available updates is created.
trans-unit.target: A job to scan for available updates is created.

trans-unit.source: If updates are available, the **Scan Updates** changes to **Install Updates**.
trans-unit.target: If updates are available, the **Scan Updates** changes to **Install Updates**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Install Updates**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Install Updates**.

trans-unit.source: An update job will be created.
trans-unit.target: An update job will be created.

trans-unit.source: Monitor the status of your update by navigating to **Jobs**.
trans-unit.target: Monitor the status of your update by navigating to **Jobs**.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] When the update job starts, it immediately displays the status as 50 percent.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] When the update job starts, it immediately displays the status as 50 percent.

trans-unit.source: The status changes to 100 percent only after the update job is complete.
trans-unit.target: The status changes to 100 percent only after the update job is complete.

trans-unit.source: There is no real-time status for the update process.
trans-unit.target: There is no real-time status for the update process.

trans-unit.source: After the device is successfully updated, enable Data 2 and Data 3 network interfaces if these were disabled.
trans-unit.target: After the device is successfully updated, enable Data 2 and Data 3 network interfaces if these were disabled.
